description: This file defines the NoteDetailFragment class, a UI component for viewing, editing, saving, and deleting a note within a notes application. It manages user interactions, observes note data via ViewModel, and handles navigation events like back presses.

classes.name: NoteDetailFragment
classes.description: UI fragment for displaying and editing the details of a Note object, including saving and deleting the note.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of NoteDetailFragment with a specified note ID.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Initializes UI elements, sets up observers, and handles back press behavior.

methods.name: saveNote
methods.description: Saves the current note, updating its title and content, or deletes if empty.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes the current note and navigates back.
